version_description:
New in version 2.1:
• It's even easier to get started
• See how much time you've spent learning
• View your progress through goals and lessons
• Easily view test scores
• Support for rich text content
• Bug fixes

New in version 2.2:

• 3D Touch now enables quick-start menu on iPhone 6S and 6S+

• Bug fixes and performance improvements

New in version 2.3:

• Vocabulary activity now lets you practice your pronunciation and evaluates your accuracy
• Bug fixes

What's new in version 2.4
• Updated lesson content offering new activities and vocabulary can now be downloaded as available
• Stability improvements
• Bug fixes

New in version 2.5:
• Learners can use their company’s single sign-on system to access the application

New in version 3.0:
• Subtitles with videos
• Images and improved support for rich text in the “Usage” activity
• Bug fixes

• Now compatible with iOS 12
• Stability improvements

• Now compatible with iOS 12
• Stability improvements
